sqlMap.select: SELECT OrgCode, BrandCode, DataSourceName FROM dbo.BIN_BrandDataSourceConfig WHERE ValidFlag = '1' AND OrgCode <> '-9999' AND BrandCode <> '-9999'

SELECT A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID, B.BIN_BrandInfoID FROM Basis.BIN_OrganizationInfo A, Basis.BIN_BrandInfo B WHERE A.OrgCode = #orgCode# AND A.ValidFlag = '1' AND A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = B.BIN_OrganizationInfoID AND B.BrandCode = #brandCode# AND B.ValidFlag = '1'

SELECT A.OrgCode, B.BrandCode FROM Basis.BIN_OrganizationInfo A, Basis.BIN_BrandInfo B WHERE A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND A.ValidFlag = '1' AND A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = B.BIN_OrganizationInfoID AND B.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND B.ValidFlag = '1'

SELECT A.BIN_CampaignGrpID, A.CampaignType, A.RuleFileContent, A.PriorityRuleDetail, A.ModifyCount, A.ValidFlag, A.RuleDetail, B.BrandCode, C.OrgCode, ISNULL(BIN_MemberClubID, 0) AS BIN_MemberClubID FROM Campaign.BIN_CampaignGrp A LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_BrandInfo B ON (A.BIN_BrandInfoID = B.BIN_BrandInfoID) LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_OrganizationInfo C ON (A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = C.BIN_OrganizationInfoID) WHERE
A.BIN_CampaignGrpID = #campaignGrpId#
A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId#
AND A.ValidFlag = #grpValidFlag#
SELECT RuleFileContent, BIN_CampaignID, RuleFilter, ModifyCount FROM Campaign.BIN_Campaign WHERE BIN_CampaignGrpID = #campaignGrpId# AND ValidFlag = '1'

SELECT A.RuleFileContent, A.BIN_CampaignID, A.BIN_CampaignGrpID, A.RuleFilter, A.CampaignType, A.ModifyCount, A.ValidFlag, B.BrandCode, C.OrgCode, D.PriorityRuleDetail, ISNULL(D.BIN_MemberClubID, 0) AS BIN_MemberClubID FROM Campaign.BIN_Campaign A LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_BrandInfo B ON (A.BIN_BrandInfoID = B.BIN_BrandInfoID) LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_OrganizationInfo C ON (A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = C.BIN_OrganizationInfoID) LEFT JOIN Campaign.BIN_CampaignGrp D ON (A.BIN_CampaignGrpID = D.BIN_CampaignGrpID) WHERE BIN_CampaignID = #campaignId#

SELECT COUNT(BIN_SaleRecordID) FROM Sale.BIN_SaleRecord WHERE BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId# AND BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND SaleTime >= #fromDate# AND SaleTime <= #toDate# AND BillCode != #billId# AND SaleType = 'NS' AND ValidFlag = '1'

SELECT BillCode AS billCode, SaleType AS saleType, BillCodePre AS billCodePre, ISNULL(Amount, 0) AS amount, SaleTime AS saleTime FROM Sale.BIN_SaleRecord WHERE BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId# AND BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND
BIN_MemberClubID = #memberClubId# AND
SaleTime >= CONVERT(DATETIME,#fromDate#,121) AND ISNULL(Amount, 0) > 0 AND (BillModel IS NULL OR BillModel IN ('0','1','3','4')) AND (IsPoint IS NULL OR IsPoint <> '0') UNION SELECT BillCode AS billCode, SaleType AS saleType, null AS billCodePre, ISNULL(Amount, 0) AS amount, BillCreateTime AS saleTime FROM Sale.BIN_ESOrderMain WHERE BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId# AND BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND BillCreateTime >= CONVERT(DATETIME,#fromDate#,121) AND ISNULL(Amount, 0) > 0 AND BillType = '2' ORDER BY saleTime

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN SaleType <> 'SR' THEN Amount ELSE -Amount END) AS ttlAmount FROM Sale.BIN_SaleRecord WHERE BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId# AND
SaleTime >= #fromTime# AND
SaleTime <= #toTime# AND
BillCode <> #firstBillId# AND
(BillCodePre IS NULL OR BillCodePre = '') AND (BillModel IS NULL OR BillModel IN ('0','1','3','4')) AND (IsPoint IS NULL OR IsPoint <> '0') AND ValidFlag = '1'
AND BIN_MemberClubID = #memberClubId#

SELECT BillCode AS billCode, ISNULL(Amount,0) AS amount FROM Sale.BIN_SaleRecord WHERE BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId# AND
SaleTime >= #fromTime# AND
SaleTime <= #toTime# AND SaleType <> 'SR' AND Amount > 0 AND (BillModel IS NULL OR BillModel IN ('0','1','3','4')) AND (IsPoint IS NULL OR IsPoint <> '0') AND ValidFlag = '1'
AND BIN_MemberClubID = #memberClubId#

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM Sale.BIN_ESOrderMain WHERE BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId# AND
BillCreateTime >= #fromTime# AND
BillCreateTime <= #toTime# AND BillType = '2' AND ValidFlag = '1'

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN SaleType <> 'SR' THEN Amount ELSE -Amount END) AS ttlAmount FROM Sale.BIN_ESOrderMain WHERE BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId# AND
BillCreateTime >= #fromTime# AND
BillCreateTime <= #toTime# AND
BillCode <> #firstBillId# AND
BillType = '2' AND ValidFlag = '1'

SELECT A.BillCode AS billCode, A.BillCodePre AS billCodePre, ISNULL(A.Amount,0) AS srAmount FROM Sale.BIN_SaleRecord A WHERE A.BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId# AND A.SaleType = 'SR' AND
A.SaleTime >= #fromTime# AND
A.ValidFlag = '1' AND A.BillCodePre IS NOT NULL AND A.BillCodePre <> ''
AND A.BIN_MemberClubID = #memberClubId#

SELECT ISNULL(SUM(A.Amount),0) AS ttlSRAmount FROM Sale.BIN_SaleRecord A, Sale.BIN_SaleRecord B, Members.BIN_MemberInfo C WHERE A.BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId# AND A.SaleType = 'SR' AND
A.SaleTime >= #fromTime# AND
A.ValidFlag = '1' AND A.BillCodePre IS NOT NULL AND A.BillCodePre <> '' AND
A.BillCodePre <> #firstBillId# AND
A.BillCodePre = B.BillCode AND A.BIN_MemberInfoID = C.BIN_MemberInfoID AND (
(B.SaleTime >= #fromTime# AND B.SaleTime <= #toTime#) OR
B.SaleTime <= #toTime# OR
(C.InitialDate IS NOT NULL AND B.SaleTime < C.InitialDate)) AND B.ValidFlag = '1'
AND A.BIN_MemberClubID = #memberClubId#

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN A.SaleType <> 'SR' THEN B.Quantity ELSE -B.Quantity END) AS quantity FROM Sale.BIN_SaleRecord A WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN Sale.BIN_SaleRecordDetail B WITH(NOLOCK) ON (A.BIN_SaleRecordID = B.BIN_SaleRecordID) WHERE A.BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId# AND A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND A.SaleTime >= #yqsDate# AND A.SaleTime < #yqeDate# AND B.SaleType = #saleType#
AND B.BIN_ProductVendorID IN
#prtIdArr[]#

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM Members.BIN_PointChange A WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN Members.BIN_PointChangeDetail B WITH(NOLOCK) ON (A.BIN_PointChangeID = B.BIN_PointChangeID) WHERE A.TradeType = 'PT' AND A.BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId# AND A.ChangeDate >= #yqsDate# AND A.ChangeDate < #yqeDate# AND B.Reason = #ptreson#

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN T.SaleType <> 'SR' THEN T.Quantity ELSE -T.Quantity END) AS quantity FROM (SELECT A.SaleType, B.Quantity FROM Sale.BIN_SaleRecord A WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN Sale.BIN_SaleRecordDetail B WITH(NOLOCK) ON (A.BIN_SaleRecordID = B.BIN_SaleRecordID) WHERE A.BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId# AND A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND A.SaleTime >= #fromTime# AND A.SaleTime < #toTime# AND (A.SaleType <> 'SR' OR A.SaleType = 'SR' AND (A.BillCodePre IS NULL OR A.BillCodePre = '')) AND B.BIN_ProductVendorID = #prtId# AND B.SaleType = #saleType# UNION ALL SELECT C.SaleType, B.Quantity FROM Sale.BIN_SaleRecord A WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN Sale.BIN_SaleRecord C WITH(NOLOCK) ON (A.BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId# AND A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND A.SaleTime >= #fromTime# AND A.SaleTime < #toTime# AND A.SaleType <> 'SR' AND A.BillCode = C.BillCodePre AND C.SaleType ='SR') JOIN Sale.BIN_SaleRecordDetail B WITH(NOLOCK) ON (C.BIN_SaleRecordID = B.BIN_SaleRecordID AND B.BIN_ProductVendorID = #prtId# AND B.SaleType = #saleType#) ) T
